newsitem.title: USA: IKOS sees lower oper earnings, higher revs.
newsitem.headline: IKOS sees lower oper earnings, higher revs.

text.p: IKOS Systems Inc on Tuesday said it expected to report third-quarter operating income of about $2 million, or $0.22 per share, which excludes estimated charges of about $7 million.
Analysts on average forecast third-quarter earnings before charges at $0.29 per share, according to a First Call survey.
The company also said it expected revenues in the third quarter ended June 28 to rise to about $14.4 million from $11.9 million in the year-earlier period.
It said the estimated $7 million in charges were related to its purchase of Zycad Corp's Lightspeed technology and related customer-transition costs.
IKOS said the transition to direct selling in Japan has been slower than previously expected.
In last year's third quarter, the company earned $1.5 million, or $0.20 per share, excluding charges.
